dict.string: en
$(EXECUTABLE_NAME)
$(PRODUCT_BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER)
$(PRODUCT_NAME)
APPL
LaunchScreen
Main
$(PRODUCT_NAME) needs access to the microphone to record audio.
$(PRODUCT_NAME) needs access to the camera to capture photos and videos.
$(PRODUCT_NAME) needs access to the photo library to save and retrieve photos and videos.
$(PRODUCT_NAME) needs access to your location while the app is in use.
$(PRODUCT_NAME) needs access to your location at all times.
$(PRODUCT_NAME) needs access to Bluetooth to connect to external devices.
$(PRODUCT_NAME) needs access to your contacts to provide personalized features.
$(PRODUCT_NAME) needs access to your calendars to manage events and reminders.
$(PRODUCT_NAME) needs access to your reminders to create and manage tasks.
$(PRODUCT_NAME) needs access to motion data to provide fitness tracking features.
$(PRODUCT_NAME) needs access to your health data to provide personalized health insights.
$(PRODUCT_NAME) needs access to update your health data to provide personalized health insights.
$(PRODUCT_NAME) needs access to HomeKit to control smart home devices.
$(PRODUCT_NAME) needs access to NFC to read NFC tags.
$(PRODUCT_NAME) needs access to your Apple Music library to play and manage music.
$(PRODUCT_NAME) needs access to Face ID for authentication purposes.
$(PRODUCT_NAME) needs access to speech recognition to transcribe audio.
